wish-simulator.title: Cloud Retainer | Wish Simulator
wish-simulator.description: Prayer simulator from the Genshin Impact game, which allows travelers to perform prayers in unlimited numbers for entertainment and statistics collection. The latest banners are available.

wish-simulator-shop.title: Cloud Retainer | Wish simulator - Shop
wish-simulator-shop.description: Shop for in-game currency and currency for making prayers: primogems, acquaint fates, intertwining fates, and so on.

wish-simulator-details.title: Cloud Retainer | Wish simulator - Details
wish-simulator-details.description: Here you can find the detailed details of the banner.

wish-simulator-history.title: Cloud Retainer | Wish simulator - History
wish-simulator-history.description: All the prayers made in the simulator are displayed here, as well as the status of the guarantors on various types of banners.

characters.title: Cloud Retainer | Characters
characters.description: A list of all Genshin Impact game characters. Here you can find detailed information about them: description, basic characteristics, assemblies, constellations, talents. A filter by elements and weapon type is available.

character-page.error-title: Cloud Retainer | Characters - Character not found!
character-page.error-description: The character has not been found! Check if the request was written correctly.
character-page.title: Cloud Retainer | Characters - {name}
character-page.description: The character {name}. Basic information, characteristics, talents, constellations, build.

weapons.title: Cloud Retainer | Weapons
weapons.description: A list of all Genshin Impact game weapons. Here you can find detailed information about them: description, characteristics, who the weapon is suitable for. A filter by rarity and type of weapon is available.

weapon-page.error-title: Cloud Retainer | Weapons - Weapon not found!
weapon-page.error-description: Weapon not found! Check if the request was written correctly.
weapon-page.title: Cloud Retainer | Weapon - {title}
weapon-page.description: Weapon {title}. Characteristics, materials for improvement, who is best suited.

achievements.title: Cloud Retainer | Achievements
achievements.description: A list of all sections and achievements in the Genshin Impact game. Mark your completed achievements in your account.

events.title: Cloud Retainer | Events
events.description: A feed of current events in the game Genshin Impact. Keep up to date with the events and rewards for them. Add events to your favorites and collect your best ones.

auth.title: Account Login
auth.not-linked: Email is already used for authorization through an account!
auth.user-with-mail-not-found: User with this email does not exist!
auth.email-exist: User with this E-Mail already registered!
auth.mail-send-notification:
Confirmation email sent!
If you don't see it in your inbox, check your spam folder!

main.title:
YOUR BEST ASSISTANT
IN THE GENSHIN IMPACT WORLD

help.title: Help
help.description: A brief summary about the site
help.main-info: The site is an assistant for the game Genshin Impact. It includes all the necessary sections for travelers. You can get acquainted with characters and weapons, their characteristics, improvement tips, try your luck in the 'Wish Simulator', view and mark achievements, learn about upcoming and past events, as well as import your in-game wish history for detailed statistics.
help.updates: All updates are published in the news on the site and in the Telegram channel.
help.links: You can ask questions, report errors, and suggest new features using the following links
help.disclaimer: The site is not affiliated with HoYoverse. All rights to the game Genshin Impact, content, and game materials belong to HoYoverse.

main.three-last-news: The last three news on the site. To see all news, click «All News»
main.activate-promo-page: To go to the activation page, click the «Activate» button
main.name: Name
main.characteristics-warning: The characteristics are specified for a character with the 90th level
main.talent-more-info: For more information, click on talent
main.artifact-warning: For more information, hover over the set
main.search-achievements: Enter the name of the achievement
main.achievements-warning: You must be logged in for achievement marks!
main.achievements-mark: The mark has been added successfully!
main.achievements-unmark: The mark has been successfully removed!

intertwined-fate.title: Intertwined Fate
intertwined-fate.description: A fateful stone that connects dreams. Its glimmers can entwine fates and connect dreams, just as how its glimmer links stars into the shapes of a heart's desires.

acquaint-fate.title: Acquaint Fate
acquaint-fate.description: A seed that lights up the night. No matter the distance apart, guided by the stone's glimmer, the fated will meet under the stars.

wish-simulator.title: Wish
wish-simulator.guarantee: Every 10 wishes is guaranteed to include at least one 4★ or higher item.
wish-simulator.crystals-not-enough:
There are not enough Genesis Crystals.
Go to the Crystal receiving screen?
wish-simulator.no-limit-novice: No time limit (Up to 20 wishes are open)

banner-descriptions.Character Event Wish: 5-star event-exclusive characters can only be obtained in the specified wish during the specified time period(s). View Details for more.
banner-descriptions.Character Event Wish-2: 5-star event-exclusive characters can only be obtained in the specified wish during the specified time period(s). View Details for more.
banner-descriptions.Standard Wish: Standard wishes have no time limit. View Details for more.

image-alts.wish-background: Background image of the wish section
image-alts.go-to-genesis-crystal-shop: The transition to obtaining Genesis Crystals
